languageCode.description: The language code. Use only ISO 639-1 codes.

values.description: One or more values (a list) for this agentDetailType.
One or more values (a list) for this administrativeDetailType.

validToInRequestedRange.description: The validTo date of the classification version this code is taken from

code.description: The ID (often a number) of the code in the KLASS classification

notes.description: A note describing the meaning of the code

validFromInRequestedRange.description: The validFrom date of the classification version this code is taken from

name.description: The name of the code at the time it was saved

classificationVersions.description: Links to the classification versions that contain the code in the given validity period

classificationId.description: An id to a classification or code list

codes.description: A list of references to classification items

subsetId.description: The global unique identifier (GUID) of the subset series this version belongs to

administrativeStatus.description: Indicator for access to an item.

description.description: The description of the information object

validFrom.description: The date on which the information object is effective or valid. Set this date only once (constant). The same date for all versions of this information object.

versionRationale.description: The reason for making this version of the information object.

versionId.description: unique id of this version of this subset

createdDate.description: The date on which the information object was created

validUntil.description: The date on which the information object is no longer effective or valid.

lastModified.description: The date time on which the object was last updated.

shortName.description: A short technical name. (Avoid special characters not supported as variable names in common programming languages).

statisticalUnits.description: Statistical unit references a subset tagged with.

administrativeDetails.description: Administrative details (e.g. default language, documentation, localID, ...).
